doc.field: Series XXIII: Pride and Progress / The Right Stuff
Series XXIII: Pride and Progress / The Right Stuff
[1]--Pride and Progress, Episode No. 24 [2]--The Right Stuff, Episode No. 141 [Air Date: 3/12/1985]
[1]--Pride and Progress, Episode No. 24 [2]--The Right Stuff, Episode No. 141 [Air Date: 3/12/1985]

Pride and ProgressNews-highlights:1. Food and Drug Administration licenses HTLV III test amid doubts of its accuracy2. LAMBDA Defense fights HTLVIII test, may sue Food and Drug Administration for unacceptably high false positive ratesCOMMERCIAL: "Lust in the Dust"3. Mariposa Foundation's Bruce Vogler discovers spermicide that eliminates HTLVIII on contact4. Update on Supreme Court cases, National Gay Task Force Versus Oklahoma City schools5. Interview with Tom Stoddard Legislative Director of New York Civil Liberties Union, discusses gay civil rights and Supreme Court casesCOMMERCIAL: "The Connection," gay and lesbian newspaper6. Future of gay civil rights7. Anti-gay violence/harassment in TexasCOMMERCIAL: National Fund for Human Dignity with actor Mike Farrell8. Minneapolis gym owner closes his business rather than abide by city's gay ordinances9. Zelda Rubinstein works for Los Angeles AIDS education group, appears on posters and ads, includes clip from "Poltergeist"COMMERCIAL: Disc-o-rama, NY video and music store10. Sports11. Healthline: Conversations with GMHC: Christopher Collins, Cooperating Attorney with LAMBDA Legal Defense and Education Fund, returns and discusses HTLVIII test12. Closing credits
The Right Stuff:1. Media reports/current events/culture including Sammy Davis Junior clip and CBS HTVLIII coverageCOMMERCIAL: "Lust in the Dust"2. Restaurant reviewCOMMERCIAL: "Manscape," a gay magazine3. Sybil Bruncheon
[1]--Pride and Progress, Episode No. 24 [2]--The Right Stuff, Episode No. 141 [Air Date: 3/12/1985]: March 1985
